channel.title: Merchanting
channel.description: What am i doing wrong? I will walk around packed worlds with about 500k and look for good deals, But its so long, i can get more money fletching, Should i buy more expensive things? Or what am i doing wrong?

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

billygotshot:

merchant barrows. buy for less sell for more. Have you ever seen those threads where they say buying all barrows pieces for these prices. then the next day you will see the same guy selling all the armour for like 100k-500k more ea.

Thats what i planned on, like buy ahrims for 1.5 and sell for 1.7, and buy torags for 1.2 and sell for 1.4

Read full topic

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:14, topic:147848”]Something thatis 95% likely to work is buying raw materials , make them into items and sell them. For instance flax, 100 each. then sell the bowstring 180ea.

Also, if u gonna try the buying low selling high or just looking for people to sell cheap items, u have to know prices and need a lot of patience, sometimes i end up selling stuff back so im not completely broke.[/quote]

thats not emrchanting, thats working and doing a skilll.

Read full topic

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

Something thatis 95% likely to work is buying raw materials , make them into items and sell them. For instance flax, 100 each. then sell the bowstring 180ea.

Also, if u gonna try the buying low selling high or just looking for people to sell cheap items, u have to know prices and need a lot of patience, sometimes i end up selling stuff back so im not completely broke.

Read full topic

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Merchanting only requires memory, and reading skills.

If you want to make profit, you have to be persistent, don’t give up if you don’t make a profit in the first 20 mins.

Read full topic

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

buying on the forums and then selling on the forums doesn’t make that much moeny. buying in varrok world 1 and selling on the forums ( and vice versa) usually makes more moeny since there is more of a price differnce

Read full topic

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I prefer to think of it as, ‘the ability to read the forums’. I didn’t know that required too much skill above the Kindergarten level.

Read full topic

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

exe626:

Skills have nothing to do with it, its all luck. You’ll ask yourself this a lot when you get into merchanting like me and my old friend Michael, “Are the fish biting today?”.

its defiently a lot of luck, but you need to know the prices so as to find the deal. the deal is luck, but finding which trade you want is the skill.

Read full topic

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

You need 3 things
Skills
Knowledge
Luck

I usually only make money through merchanting by luck of someone wanting to sell something cheap (e.g. some guy wanted to sell his mud staff quick for 1.3m, i knowing it was 1.8mil on the market bought it imideatly(sp?))

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

Frell:

So if you know the prices, then good deals will pop out to you?

yes. you just look for someonewho selling for to low.

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

^, No you don’t, you just need to know prices.

Look at the forums, which items are popular, with a varied price range.

This is what i did…Bought a black mask (The price ranged depending on the time) 350-400k, then made a thread on the forum selling for 475k-500k, and people bought. I made 3m in a morning.

Read full topic

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Merchanting is natural, I made 3m in a day and I can’t even remember what I bought and sold. YOU NEED THE SKILLS

Read full topic
